template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Organizes and arranges matter into increasingly large configurations across the universe.

interfaces.name: Stellar and Planetary Systems
interfaces.description: Processes matter and energy, supporting complex internal dynamics. Components: Stars, planets, moons, asteroids, comets.

interfaces.name: Galaxies
interfaces.description: Aggregates stellar and planetary systems into gravitationally bound collections. Components: Stars, stellar systems, gas, dust, dark matter halos.

interfaces.name: Galaxy Clusters and Superclusters
interfaces.description: Arranges galaxies into larger, gravitationally interacting groups. Components: Galaxy groups, clusters, hot intracluster gas.

interfaces.name: Cosmic Web
interfaces.description: Forms the largest known organization of matter, creating filaments and voids. Components: Galaxy clusters, superclusters, intergalactic medium.
